'''''lhaw''''' is the [[Sindarin]] word for a pair of ears.<ref name=PE>{{PE|17}}, p. 77</ref>  See also ''[[lhewig]]''.
==Etymology==
*Derives from the [[Sundocarme|root]] SLAS<ref name=PE/>
==Cognates==
*[[Quenya]] ''[[hlaru]]''<ref name=PE/>

==Examples==
* ''[[Amon Lhaw|Amon '''Lhaw''']]''
